original: Björkman, Yngve, direktör, Sävsjö, f. 14/5/03 i Sthlm av ing. Richard B. o. Märta Lothigius. G. m. Gunvor Lenhardtson. Barn: Ulf Yngve, Jan Fredrik. — Stud:ex. 21, prakt. stud. i USA o. Engl. 21-23, v. odika bilfabr. samt v. Remy Engineering School. Föret, ett flert. res. t. Tyskl., Engl, Frankr. o. USA. Reseinsp. o. sederm. avd:chef v. Ford Motor Co. 28-33, försäljn :insp. h. A-B Sv. Bilfabr. 33-37, disp. o. sv. avd :chef i Willys Överland AS i Köpenhamn 37-39, försäljn :chef v. A-B Nyköpings Automo-bilfabr. 39-46, verkst. diir. i A-B Vatten o. Angå o. Sävsjö Järnindustri i Sävsjö sed. 46.
translated: Björkman, Yngve, director, Sävsjö, b. 14/5/03 in Stockholm to engineer Richard B. and Märta Lothigius. Married to Gunvor Lenhardtson in the year 19xx. Children: Ulf Yngve, Jan Fredrik. - Graduated from high school in 1921, practical studies in the USA and England from 1921-1923, worked at various car factories and at the Remy Engineering School. Has traveled extensively to Germany, England, France, and the USA. Was a traveling inspector and later department head at Ford Motor Co. from 1928-1933, sales inspector at A-B Swedish Car Factory from 1933-1937, manager and director of the Swedish department at Willys Overland AS in Copenhagen from 1937-1939, sales manager at A-B Nyköpings Automobile Factory from 1939-1946, and managing director at A-B Vatten and Anga and Sävsjö Ironworks in Sävsjö since 1946.

memberOf.name: Willys Overland AS
memberOf.jobTitle: Manager and director of the Swedish department

memberOf.name: A-B Vatten and Anga and Sävsjö Ironworks
